item.title: CSAW 2024 - Obfuscation
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: The goal of this challenge is to reverse this highly obfuscated binary and get the correct passphrase Explanation The program asks for a passphrase, because of that and the name of the program I assumed there would some passphrase obfuscated, so I decompiled it : Couldn’t understand anything so I checked if maybe it was packed ? Nope, okay we’ll let’s use BinaryNinja then : 93A3 is our function, so let’s set a breakpoint at the start of it and see what happens to our input :
